snippet: The extra New York State primary will cost state taxpayers $50 million for their trouble.
abstract: Editorial supports New York State Assembly's bill calling for a single day for federal, state and local primaries in June; criticizes State Senate for wanting two different dates for primary elections; urges Gov Andrew Cuomo to press the Senate to save taxpayer money and agree to a single day for primaries.
lead_paragraph: The extra New York State primary will cost state taxpayers $50 million for their trouble.
